name: Serry Beach Resort
description: Well located in Hurghada, Serry Beach Resort provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Featuring a kids' club, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Each room has a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms come with a kitchenette equipped with a microwave. At Serry Beach Resort each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis, and darts at the hotel. Speaking Arabic, German, English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception.
address: Safaga Road,Makadi Bay,Red Sea Governorate,Egypt

name: Titanic Beach - Families and Couples Only
description: Offering a spa centre and sauna, Titanic Beach - Families and Couples only is situated in Hurghada. The resort features an outdoor pool and a private beach area. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include views of the sea or pool. All rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a shower. You will find a hairdresser's at the property. You can play tennis at the resort, and the area is popular for snorkeling. New Marina is 16 km from Titanic Beach - Families and Couples only, while Giftun Island is 18 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hurghada International Airport, 12 km from the property. Free parking is available.
address: Safaga Road, Makadi Bay P.O. Box 642,Makadi Bay,Red Sea Governorate,Egypt

name: Gravity Hotel & Aqua Park Hurghada Families and Couples Only
description: With a stay at Desert Rose Resort in Hurghada, you'll be 10.8 mi (17.3 km) from Marina Hurghada and 12.5 mi (20.1 km) from Hurghada City Center. This 5-star hotel is 12.8 mi (20.6 km) from Abdulmoneim Riadh Mosque and 14.1 mi (22.7 km) from Makadi Water World. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages. After dipping into one of the 3 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities. Enjoy Italian cuisine at La Dolce Vita-Chargeable, one of the hotel's 5 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. When you are in need of a refreshing drink, visit the poolside bar or one of 10 bars/lounges, or 4 beach bars. Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Hurghada? This hotel has 6997 square feet (650 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and 2 meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and limited parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 856 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
address: Safaga Road,Hurghada,Red Sea Governorate,Egypt

name: Hurghada Marriott Beach Resort
description: requented by repeat guests, the Hurghada Marriott Beach Resort offers the opportunity to experience a new side of the crystal Red Sea. A unique location in the heart of Hurghada allows you to browse varieties of options in Hurghada town, and experience the nightlife. Attentive service ensures a satisfactory stay whether it is for leisure or business. You will experience luxury service from the moment you step into our Resort, and feel welcomed by our multilingual staff.Check-in to our sea view rooms or suites facing the sparkling beach. Enjoy a dip in our pool. Take your massage on our private bamboo island as palms sway and the fresh air provides a soothing rhythm. Keep your figure in shape in our tennis courts and our fully equipped GYM. Treat yourself in our restaurants and bars. Discover the Red Sea secrets with the help of the onsite Diving Center experts.All this and so much more lies just outside your door at our Hurghada Marriott Beach Resort.
address: Sahl Hashish Rd,Hurghada,Red Sea Governorate,Egypt

name: Sunrise Holidays Resort (Adults Only)
description: SUNRISE Holidays Resort, the first Adults-Only Resort in Egypt, is situated on a private beach lagoon that enriches the rejuvenating holiday vacation with its idyllic sea view. Located 500m (10 min) to Hurghada Centre and 9km (14 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the Resort offers the best of both worlds: enjoying a relaxing and revitalizing atmosphere as well as experiencing the exciting nightlife of Hurghada.
address: Cornish Road,Hurghada,Red Sea Governorate,Egypt

name: Titanic Palace Families and Couples Only
description: About 450 m from the hotel`s own beach lies the hotel Titanic Palace. The city centre is around 17 km away. There is a shuttle between the hotel and the airport (for a fee). The beach is patrolled by a lifeguard. Here, there are sun loungers, cushions and beach towels available. At the beach there is a bar serving refreshing drinks. The hotel has a 24h reception (check-in is possible around the clock), a lobby bar, internet access (for a fee), a lift, a supermarket and other shops, cash machine, a hairdresser, a jacuzzi, a first aid kit as well as a TV lounge with satellite TV. In the outdoor area you will find a seasonally heated pool (open all year), where sun loungers and pool towels are available for free. For children there is also a children's pool with 8 water slides. Furthermore, you can relax outdoors on a terrace. Inside the hotel you can use an indoor pool. You can store your valuables in the safe, and your luggage in the hotel`s storage room. For your entertainment, the hotel offers a theatre and a disco. For the young hotel guests there is a playground. For very young guests, kid`s chairs can also be provided. There is also a laundry service available at an additional cost to customers. For your comfort, in addition to the concierge service the hotel page will ensure you are looked after. If necessary, you can contact the medical centre at any time (for a fee). Guests at the accommodation can get a wake-up call from the hotel personnel. For conventions and other business meetings, the hotel offers EXTRA_FEE conference rooms with a reception as well as scanner. In your hotel, a lot of focus is placed on sustainability. This includes among others a central room air-conditioning. Due to its barrier-free facilities , such as barrier-free entrances, wheelchair accessible rooms and a wheelchair accessible lift, the hotel is also suitable for wheelchair users. Catering As catering services the hotel offers all-inclusive, full board, full board plus and self-catering. Breakfast is offered continental or from the buffet. Enjoy your lunch from the buffet. Dinner is also served as a buffet or à la carte. All Inclusive Light includes coffee & tea. For the meals, there are a restaurant with terrace (Italian and calorie-reduced dishes) and several bars, a 24h snackbar as well as the pool bar. The drinks menu of the hotel includes soft drinks. Distances Airport: approximately at 10 km Bus stop: approximately at 300 m Sports & Leisure To keep your fitness up on holiday, there is a gym for guests to use. For an fee, you can take advantage of various water sports, such as water aerobics. There is also the option to play bowling or billiards. With beach volleyball and volleyball various other sports offer a lot of variety on holiday. In addition to a tennis court (hard court) with floodlighting there is also a tennis rental. Furthermore, various water sports such as sailing, windsurfing, snorkelling and diving (including rental service) are offered in the area. Beginners as well as advanced divers can improve their skills under water with an instructor at a diving school. Kiting is also possible in the surroundings of the hotel. For kiters, a kite rental service is available. A sauna (extra fee) awaits you in the hotel`s own spa. The hotel also offers massages (extra fee) and beauty treatments (extra fee). Spend some healthy and relaxing hours with heat therapy. Infants can be looked after in the hotel`s own baby club. For older children the care takes place in the children`s club. There is a babysitting service in the hotel (extra fee) . The mini disco also offers age-appropriate entertainment for young hotel guests. In terms of adult entertainment, evening shows and live music are presented and there is a games room available to use. Additional information The 3-storey hotel, newly built in 2010, has a total of 593 rooms.
address: Sahl Hashish Rd,Hurghada,Red Sea Governorate,Egypt

Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 6 bars/lounges. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in El Gouna? This hotel has 1012 square feet (94 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and 2 meeting rooms. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 268 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers.
address: Golf Island, Hurghada 2,El Gouna,Red Sea Governorate,Egypt

name: Jaz Aquamarine Resort
description: Imagine living like royalty in five star opulence on the immaculate Red Sea. Or leave the imagining to less savvy travelers. By booking a holiday at Jaz Aquamarine you have private beach access lavish facilities and a booming night scene. The resort stands on the southern tip of Hurghada famous for its spectacular scuba diving and windsurfing. The resort is a self contained city of leisure complete with 18 swimming pools three of which are located in the adjacent Jaz Bluemarine three water parks and a host of restaurants and bars. It is a grand palace of 1001 plush guestrooms with a host of extra services and amenities against extra charge like room service car rental and limousine service a pharmacy airport pick up and drop off an on call doctor shuttle bus from and to Esplanada Mall and Senzo Mall in Hurghada in addition to ATM and exchange machines.

Guests who enjoy maintaining their fitness regimen while on holiday can visit the fitness center provided by resort.

name: Serry Beach Resort
description: Well located in Hurghada, Serry Beach Resort provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Featuring a kids' club, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Each room has a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms come with a kitchenette equipped with a microwave. At Serry Beach Resort each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis, and darts at the hotel. Speaking Arabic, German, English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception.

New Marina is 16 km from Titanic Beach - Families and Couples only, while Giftun Island is 18 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hurghada International Airport, 12 km from the property. Free parking is available.
